meanings.definition: A type of bet in which the bettor selects the first two finishers in a race in any order.
meanings.sent1: During the horse race, I placed a quinela on the two horses I thought would finish first and second.
meanings.sent2: She won some money by correctly predicting the quinela of the race.
meanings.sent3: The friends had a friendly quinela competition to see who could guess the top two finishers.
meanings.sent4: His quinela choice was like hitting the jackpot in the race.
meanings.sent5: The quinela bet made the race even more exciting for the spectators.

meanings.definition: A type of bet in which the bettor selects the first two finishers in a race in exact order.
meanings.sent1: Winning a quinela with the exact order of finishers is quite challenging.
meanings.sent2: The quinela payout is higher when you correctly predict the exact order of the top two horses.
meanings.sent3: Their quinela picks matched the race results perfectly, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Getting the quinela right in order is like solving a tricky puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The quinela in precise order made the race outcome even more thrilling.
